net.sf.hajdbc

Interface DatabaseClusterListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StateManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRootProxyFactory, BerkeleyDBStateManager, CommonDataSourceProxyFactory, ConnectionPoolDataSourceProxyFactory, DataSourceProxyFactory, DistributedStateManager, DriverProxyFactory, SimpleStateManager, SQLiteStateManager, SQLStateManager, XADataSourceProxyFactory

    public interface DatabaseClusterListener
extends EventListener
    Event listener for cluster events.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro
